putBackDraggedPiece() - Method in class Stratego.GameBoard
putBackDraggedPiece: This method would be called when the user tries to place a dragged piece into an occupied cell or to an illegal location, like outside the panel.
putPiece(StrategoPiece, int, int) - Method in class Stratego.GameBoardManager
This mutator method will put the piece argument at location (column, row) only if it is currently not occupied and the game has not started, incrementing the counter.
